description:
Opgenomen op mijn dakterras. Donder: Halsbandparkieten en duiven zijn aan het eten maar vluchten uiteindelijk toch voor de regen die later in hagel verandert. Op de achtergrond het Carillon van de Grote Kerk. 

Recorded on my roofterrace. Thunder: Rose ringed parakeets and pigeons are eating but eventually they flee the rain that turns into hail a few minutes later. You can also hear the Carillon of the Grote Kerk.

Aporee: http://aporee.org/maps/?loc=10517
title: Vogels, regen, donder en klokken/Birds, rain, thunder and bells (Den Haag, June 10th 2011)

also some manual spectral editing / composing. and lots of reverb going on here.

tag_list: binaural fieldrecording soundscape soundart noise ambience phonography
description: Wildlife binaurally recorded in Korsvika on the 9 of May 2011.  You can clearly hear the Russ in their hormonal frenzy chatting away like drunk seagulls.  Their mating ritual music can be heard through their babbling.  Other humanoid and some avian species can also be heard through the noise from the Russ.
title: Swamps Up Nostrils - 08 - 9 mai dyreliv i korsvika del 2

tag_list: binaural soundscape fieldrecording soundart ambience noise phonography
description: Binaural recording done the 9 of May in the park in front of the Dronning Mauds building in Trondheim.  A group of rather vocal girls, someone is playing ball, the traffic down the road, avian varieties, a train, and then near the end an underground explosion from the work on the new tunnel close by.  Through this recording I am first sitting in slack lotus position with my head towards the road, then turn 90 degrees to the rigth and lie down supporting my uppoer bodey on my elbows, and then lie down completely with my head resing on my hands on the ground.  You should be able to hear when i make the 'switches'.
title: Swamps Up Nostrils - 01 - 9 mai parkscape

tag_list: London river water binaural phonography DPA
description: Loud rushing sound of the river Wandle in south London caused by a noticeable drop in the river. Technical bollocks: recorded with 2 x DPA 2006C mics and Fostex FR-2LE recorder. High pass filter at 80Hz in Izotope RX2. Plenty more London sounds on the London Sound Survey at http://www.soundsurvey.org.uk
title: The river Wandle, Summerstown: headworn DPA 2006C mics

description:
See NEW Video link
and http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1kyQ0VmhPY4
'Save NHS - Kill Lansley’s Bill' march 17 May 2011 London, another peaceful demonstration in London agains cutbacks, etc. Held in the early evening. Not featured in the main stream newsmedia perhaps because there was no violence.

Photograph by Alice Newsholme

A Field recording. From University College Hospital to Whhitehall.

If you want to know more about Andrew Lansley's health legislation try these links:

http://www.metro.co.uk/news/859966-nhs-reform-bill-put-on-hold-after-genuine-concerns
http://news.sky.com/skynews/Home/UK-News/Health-Bill-Andrew-Lansley-Called-On-To-Withdraw-NHS-Reform-Plans/Article/201103215952155?lpos=UK_News_First_Home_Article_Teaser_Region_1&lid=ARTICLE_15952155_Health_Bill%3A_Andrew_Lansley_Called_On_To_Withdraw_NHS_Reform_Plans
http://www.keepournhspublic.com/index.php
http://www.labournet.net/ukunion/1101/lansley1.html
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-12953646
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/2011/04/05/health-policy-falls-apart-as-andrew-lansley-humiliated-over-nhs-reforms-115875-23038585/
http://l-r-c.org.uk/news/story/save-the-nhs-kill-lansleys-bill/
http://www.communitycare.co.uk/blogs/adult-care-blog/2011/04/sorry-folks-but-its-the.html
http://news1.ghananation.com/international/142032-andrew-lansley-health-reforms-nhs-chiefs-run-up-13m-expenses-bill.html
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newsvideo/8427557/Andrew-Lansley-genuine-concerns-with-NHS-bill.html
http://www.ft.com/cms/s/0/8b7b0290-86f3-11e0-92df-00144feabdc0.html#axzz1NQSFE2DK
title: March in May 2011 London -  [Free download] NEW > Now a Video
